Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: /cc ~wenjian , ~harrisob@us.ibm.com thoughts? Can we contain this in time for the 1.2 cut?

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: initialize will take a 'target' parameter to indicate the peer to use, may be an actual peer object or a peer name.

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: Change went in when doing the discovery work as it was needed for that also.
